articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Scientists have found a weak spot in our DNA that is present in 95% of people with the disease.
articles.title: Major cause of inflammatory bowel disease found

articles.description: More than two dozen potential jurors shared personal stories of addiction, revealing the scale of the issue.
articles.title: Hunter Biden jury pool highlight toll of US drug epidemic

articles.description: The Russian president has been criticising the West's delivery of long-range weapons to Ukraine.
articles.title: Putin warns Russia could provide weapons for others to strike West

articles.description: The actress, known for roles in Dead to Me and Anchorman, was diagnosed with the disease in 2021.
articles.title: Applegate 'doesn't enjoy living' after MS diagnosis

articles.description: US astronauts ride a new crew capsule to orbit after a long and tortuous development programme.
articles.title: Boeing launches long-delayed astronaut capsule

articles.description: DNA tests have confirmed all three infants found in east London are full siblings, the BBC can report.
articles.title: Abandoned baby Elsa is third newborn deserted by same parents

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A female peregrine fled her nest for several hours when a laser was shone into her bird box.
articles.title: Man hands himself in over Cromer peregrine laser incident

articles.description: A court in Florence reconvicts Amanda Knox for slander in relation to the murder of Meredith Kercher.
articles.title: Amanda Knox reconvicted in slander case

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Other chains will be able to sell poultry-based "Big Macs" following a ruling by the European Court of Justice
articles.title: McDonald's loses right to chicken Big Mac name

articles.description: The killing of Yolanda Sanchez comes just hours after a historic landslide victory for Mexico's first woman president.
articles.title: Mexico election: Mayor killed after first woman elected leader
